Posts.Content: sweetpea4170 wrote: after spending a day digging an area for my pond,  i felt a large mass on the top part of my breast that burned slightly.  had a mammagram done on monday,  with results being a birad 5.  higly suspicious of cancer. went in wednsday for a needle biospy, and am now waiting for results.  since the day i first felt the large mass, it is now almost nothing, can barely feel anything.  mammagram and ultrasound saw microcalcifications in a linerar pattern with 1 lymph node being slightly enlarged. are birad 5 findings almost always positive for cancer and why would the mass be barely there now Dx 6/29/2009, DCIS, 2cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/0 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: can barely feel lump sweetpea4170 idaho
